Screen recording session already active Camera already active Screen recording started Screen recording stopped Screen recording resumed Screen recording paused Storage permission denied No videos available No images available File deleted successfully! May not work for all Loading Video not found! Acquiring root access failed. Please add text first! Can not retrieve selected video Video shorter than 3 seconds Save video failed Save mp3 failed Compress failed Take screenshot failed Processing Please wait while the process is canceled Screen already recording Are you sure you want to exit? Its will be lost!!! Saving Cannot be changed during the recording session Cannot write to selected directory. Path will not be saved. No directory selected No permission to write to directory Directory already exists Error creating directory Waiting for device shake Shake your device to start recording or press this notification to cancel Wait for seconds available can be recorded File is limited to 4 GB size Do you want to stop screen recording ? // Create Folder Enter folder name Storage Permission Denied The app requires storage permission to save the recorded video and change default save directory.The app is rendered useless without the permission

Share with I suggest this app for you: Share app Tell me something is not correct Report an application issue // (Very low) (Low) (Good) (Excellent) (Warning) Auto Portrait Landscape // FAQ question How to turn on the countdown before start? How to record videos screen? How to take a screenshot? Why does the video have no sound?
How to record videos with sound? Why is the video blurred?
How to record videos in high resolution? How to see video storage? How to change where to save video? Why do so many other videos end with _1, _2,… when I shoot only one video? // FAQ answer 1. Go to app
2. Tap setting
3. Choose countdown before start
4. Select time 1. Go to app
2. Tap video
3. Click the video record button to start
4. Click the stop button to finish 1. Go to app
2. Tap setting
3. Choose show floating button
4. Go to screen you want to capture
5. Click the draw button
6. Choose camera to capture 1. Go to app
2. Tap setting
3. Choose audio settings
4. Choose mic 1. Go to app
2. Tap setting
3. Choose resolution
4. Choose corresponding resolution 1. Go to app
2. Tap setting
3. Choose save video location in save options 1. Go to app
2. Tap setting
3. Choose save video location in save options
4. Choose corresponding folder 1. Because files on android devices are limited to 4 GB size, so we have to create new files end with _1, _2,…
2. If not split into multiple files, file will be lost after 4 GB
Storage permission Floating button Record audio
Allows screen recorder to access photos, media and files on your device Allows app to draw over the other apps Allows app to record the screen with audio Allow Microphone Access Allow Storage Access Get permission Start Next Recorder Home Draw Camera Exit Pause Stop
